title: ´It´s a great night for everyone´ – Genesio revels as Lille shock Madrid
description: Bruno Genesio revelled in “a great night for everyone”, as “incredible” Lille stunned Champions League holders Real Madrid 1-0 at Stade Pierre-Mauroy. Jonathan David’s first-half penalty – after Eduardo Camavinga handled from Edon Zhegrova’s free-kick – ended Madrid’s 14-match unbeaten streak in this competition, while condemning them to a first reverse overall in 36 games. title: Motta praises Juve spirit after thrilling fightback at Leipzig
description: Thiago Motta hailed Juventus’ team spirit after they shrugged off two injuries and Michele Di Gregorio’s red card to secure a thrilling 3-2 Champions League win over RB Leipzig. title: Dinamo Zagreb 2-2 Monaco: Zakaria snatches point at drenched Stadion Maksimir
description: Monaco came from two goals down to snatch a 2-2 draw at Dinamo Zagreb in the Champions League at a rain-sodden Stadion Maksimir, with Denis Zakaria equalising with an 89th-minute penalty. title: Sturm Graz 0-1 Club Brugge: Tzolis strike seals visitors´ first win
description: Christos Tzolis scored the only goal as Club Brugge edged out Sturm Graz 1-0 for their first win in this season’s Champions League. The Greece international delivered the decisive blow in the 23rd minute at 28 Black Arena on Wednesday. title: RB Leipzig 2-3 Juventus: Ten-man Bianconeri claim improbable comeback win

title: Lille 1-0 Real Madrid: David penalty stuns Champions League holders
description: Jonathan David’s first-half penalty saw Lille stun Champions League holders Real Madrid on Wednesday, handing Los Blancos their first loss in any competition since January.
